subject: Outstanding Commission Payment Request.
description_text:
Team
simsonn <http://ececile.it/>




I hope this message reaches you.



I am writing as an affiliate of your program through GoAffPro to
request payment of a pending commission for a sale generated on Aug ,
2025. The details are below:



Sales Date: Aug , 2025

Order Value:  $360.74


     Commission:  $20.81

      My PayPal account is linked in GoAffPro for payment processing,
but for your convenience, here are the details again:
alvaroaponte22548@gmail.com.



I request your prompt assistance in processing this payment. If you
need more information, please let me know.



Thank you for your attention and I look forward to your confirmation.



Sincerely,

dayana trujillo

Affiliate Partner

conversations.body_text: Hi welcome10,  Our commission payments start once the amount reaches USD 60.Â
